In his book on felnting and Fteality (Pantheon Books, New York
1957) Etienne Gilson pointed out that until Giotto a painting
had not been a report about things, but a thing. Prom Giotto
till Cezanne, painting became increasingly reportorial and
representational. Since Cezanne, paintings have become
things again, (pp.284-5). That is, perspective and reporting
